Actions.Name: Comet
Actions.Description: The Jotunn hurls a spare weapon in a line 3 area, where it comes to rest as a height 1 terrain piece. Characters adjacent to the weapon when it lands take fray damage and are shoved 1 space. Spaces adjacent to the weapon are difficult terrain.
